sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.OutboundHTTPLogLevelAjax</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>true</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>OutboundHTTPLogLevelAjax</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var OutboundHTTPLogLevelAjax = Class.create();
OutboundHTTPLogLevelAjax.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
	setLogLevel : function() {
		var outboundMessageType = this.getParameter('sysparm_outbound_message_type');
		var outboundMessageFn = this.getParameter('sysparm_outbound_message_fn');
		var logLevel = this.getParameter('sysparm_outbound_message_log_level');

		var gRecord = new GlideRecordSecure('sys_outbound_http_log_level');
		gRecord.addQuery('outbound_message_type', outboundMessageType);
		gRecord.addQuery('outbound_message_function', outboundMessageFn);
		gRecord.query();

		if (gRecord.next()) {
			gRecord.setValue('log_level', logLevel);
			gRecord.update();
			return true;
		} else {
			gRecord = new GlideRecordSecure('sys_outbound_http_log_level');
			gRecord.setValue('outbound_message_type', outboundMessageType);
			gRecord.setValue('outbound_message_function', outboundMessageFn);
			gRecord.setValue('log_level', logLevel);
			gRecord.insert();
			return true;
		}
		return false;
	},

	type: 'OutboundHTTPLogLevelAjax'
});]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2016-06-27 18:37:41</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>719f0cd147102200f4b7d7527c9a7182</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>10</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>OutboundHTTPLogLevelAjax</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Outbound HTTP Log" source="com.glide.outbound_http_log">e744050f6da620100acb70b3534330d1</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_719f0cd147102200f4b7d7527c9a7182</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2016-06-27 20:23:08</sys_updated_on>
        <u_script_length>1075</u_script_length>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
